      • getUserIdByEmail

        public long getUserIdByEmail(java.lang.String userEmailAddress,
                             java.lang.String password)
        Authenticates user via username and password. Successful authentication will return the user ID.
        Unsuccessful authentication will throw NumberFormat Exception
        Parameters:
        userEmailAddress - - user's email address
        password - - user's account password
        Returns:
        User ID of the user's Email address

      • getUserRolesbyId

        public java.lang.String getUserRolesbyId(java.lang.String user,
                                         java.lang.String pass,
                                         long userId)
        Returns list of JSON objects describing the User Roles of the User
        Parameters:
        user - - username (usually email address)
        pass - - user password
        userId - User Id that we wish to know the roles.
        Returns:
        User roles
